articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Hong Kong shares jump over 2% as Alibaba surges 15%; Asia markets largely up - CNBC
articles.description: Asian markets trade mixed as investors observe the reaction to Alibaba's Asian shares after reorganization, while Australia will see its inflation numbers for February.
articles.content:
Alibaba's major shakeup could be followed by its Chinese technology peers, according to KraneShares' CIO Brendan Ahern.
"I think investors are saying what we saw in Alibaba, really the leader in Chi… [+625 chars]
